name: Amazing Maze (itch)
description:
A PCG maze generator that builds a 30 tile by 30 tile maze via a growing tree algorithm.  You need to get keys to unlock doors to get to the end of the maze (the purple spot).

Use either the arrow keys or WASD to move the player around.

Press the space key to begin generating a new maze.

Made for a Game Artificial Intelligence class by Elizabeth Renn, Aaron Hoang, and Dan Grover.
